import { t } from '@superset-ui/core';
import { getStandardizedControls, sections } from '@superset-ui/chart-controls';
import { xAxisLabel, yAxisLabel, bottomMargin, xTicksLayout, xAxisFormat, yLogScale, yAxisBounds, xAxisShowMinmax, yAxisShowMinmax, leftMargin, timeSeriesSection } from '../NVD3Controls';
const config = {
  controlPanelSections: [
  sections.legacyTimeseriesTime,
  timeSeriesSection[0],
  {
    label: t('Chart Options'),
    expanded: true,
    controlSetRows: [['color_scheme']] },

  {
    label: t('X Axis'),
    expanded: true,
    controlSetRows: [
    [xAxisLabel, bottomMargin],
    [xTicksLayout, xAxisFormat],
    [xAxisShowMinmax, null]] },


  {
    label: t('Y Axis'),
    expanded: true,
    controlSetRows: [
    [yAxisLabel, leftMargin],
    [yAxisShowMinmax, yLogScale],
    ['y_axis_format', yAxisBounds]] },


  timeSeriesSection[1],
  sections.annotations],

  formDataOverrides: (formData) => ({
    ...formData,
    groupby: getStandardizedControls().popAllColumns(),
    metrics: getStandardizedControls().popAllMetrics() }) };


export default config;
